name: Rebound 2 2: Revelations
description:
NOTE: Due to a system error, I wasn't able to add the .TIC (source code) to this page. It can be downloaded from here (click on the "download cart" link). Note that this game uses features provided by the pro version of TIC-80, so you'll need that to open it for editing. You can get the pro version of TIC-80 from here: https://nesbox.itch.io/tic

Originally submitted to Battle of the Bits Very Rare Formats. The original entry can be found here: http://battleofthebits.org/arena/Entry/Rebound+2+2_+Revelations/31384/

It's finally here: REBOUND 2 2!!! The sequel to Rebound 2 that nobody asked for!!!

After the "events" of Rebound 2, our (still?) nameless hero sets out to do another thing. Along the way he'll encounter more things! Exciting!

Now with 50% more stuff, including:

- Backtracking!

- Optional rooms! Some of which may or may not have coins!

- Final map completion percentage!

- A bigger map than Rebound 2!

- Tile animations!

- Stuff!

- Super fancy opening splash screen!

- Optional tutorial area!

Current version: 1.1

Changelog for v1.1:

- Fixed an off-by-one error that made 100% map completion impossible.

- Minor map tweaks and fixes.
